item.title: Our Menu
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to the Brooklyn Meatball Company! All meatbals, sauces, dressings and desserts are made from scratch in house using the freshest ingredients and the finest imported pastas, tomatoes, extra virgin olive oil, and cheeses from Italy. Every meatball is hand rolled and over baked to perfection. Please choose your meatball, choose your sauce, choose some ways to enjoy them, have fun and Buon Appetito!
— Joey Galluzzi

The Original "Saucy Balls"TM

  • As Featured on NBC's America's Next Great Restaurant with Bobby Flay
  • Meatball and sauce of your choice.
  • Served with fresh bread and basil ricotta.

Prices

ONE
$3
TWO
$5
THREE
$7

Choose Your Meatball

Classic
These are the ones Grandma made every Sunday. This generations old family recipe is made with 100% USDA choice beef, garden fresh herbs, and baked to perfection.
Turkey
Made with 100% lean turkey meat for a lighter, leaner, version of the family recipe and still loaded with flavor. Don't tell Grandma!
Eggplant
No meat in this one! Made with freshly harvested eggplant, oven roasted to golden brown deliciousness.

Choose Your Sauce

Joey's MarinaraTM
Perfectly ripe hand picked certified San Marzano tomatoes grown in the especially rich soil of Italy's Mt. Vesuvius region, extra virgin olive oil, fresh garlic, and herbs.
Spicy Marinara
Joey's Marinara packin' heat.
Creamy Gorgonzola*
Luxurious white sauce made with improted gorgonzola cheese from Italy. Pure indulgence!
Pesto
Bright, lively, and flavorful. This Italian staple sauce is made with fresh spinach, basil, garlic, imported extra virgin olive oil blended with walnuts.

Saucy Sub

Your choice of meatball & sauce on a fresh baked baguette topped with fresh melted mozzarella and balsamic glaze.

Prices

1/3
$4
2/3
$7
WHOLE
$10

Choose A Side

Your choice of Pasta or Salad.

Prices

SMALL
$4
BIG
$7

Pasta

Spaghetti
For the ultimate classic comfort food: Spaghetti & Meatballs.
Rigatoni
Hearty, short tube shaped pasta for a big bite — my favorite!

Salad

House
Beautiful Arrangement of Arugula, romaine, baby portobello mushrooms, cherry tomatoes, red onions, crumbled gorgonzola, candied walnuts, apple vinaigrette, and topped with a balsamic glaze drizzle.
Caprese
Fresh Tomatoes, fresh basil, and fresh mozzarella drizzled with imported extra virgin olice oil & balsamic glaze.
Caesar
The Italian classic with homemade croutons and house made dressing.
  • * Please add $0.50/ball for creamy gorgonzola on saucy balls or saucy subs
  • * Please add 1 small pasta/2 big pasta

Beverages

Overall

Coke
$2
Diet Coke
$2
Sprite
$2
Diet Sprite
$2
Dr. Pepper
$2
Tea
$2
Coffee
$2
Bottled Water
$1.5

Breaskfast

Orange Juice
$1.99
Ozarka Water
$1.49

Extras

Extra Ball
$2
Sauces (1/2 cup)
$2
Basil Ricotta
$1.5
Pecorino Romano
$0.50

Desserts

House made Tiramisu
$3
Cannoll
$3

Breakfast Menu

Breakfast Sub
$2.49
2 eggs omelet style served on fresh 6" baguette
  • Add Cheese: .50
  • Add a Garden Fresh Ingredient: .25/ea.
Breakfast "Smashball" Sub
$3.49
2 eggs omelet style served with a BMC signature beef or turkey Meatball smashed into a Breakfast Sausuage Patty on a fresh 6" baguette
  • Add Cheese: .50
  • Add a Garden Fresh Ingredient: .25/ea.
Four Star Omelet
$3.99
2 egg omelet cooked right in front of you hotel style with your choice of Garden fresh ingredients and cheese served on top of breakfast potatoes
"BMC" Breakfast Potatoes
$1.49
Fresh homestyle oven roasted potatoes

item.title: Our Story
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Philosophy

BROOKLYN MEATBALL COMPANY is a fast casual concept focused on Meatballs. It is my hearts desire and passion to bring the homecooked, authentic, Italian flavor of “Sunday Meatballs and Macaroni” to American people EVERYDAY using the best, freshest ingredients at an affordable price. Every meatball is hand rolled, and all meatballs, sauces, dressings & desserts are made in-house from scratch using the finest imported tomatoes, pastas, extra virgin olive oils, balsamic vinegar & cheeses from ITALY. Rather than looking at the Meatball as a mere side dish, BROOKLYN MEATBALL COMPANY fills a void in the market place by recognizing the significance of the Meatball in Italy’s culinary history dating back to ancient Rome. BROOKLYN MEATBALL COMPANY is wholly dedicated to bringing you the highest quality, most delicious Meatball and proudly features different variations of the Meatball as a main course.

The Gist

At BROOKLYN MEATBALL COMPANY you may enjoy your choice of CLASSIC Meatballs (these are the ones Grandma made every Sunday, a generations old family recipe which calls for a blend of veal, beef, pork, & garden fresh herbs baked to perfection); BEEF Meatballs; TURKEY Meatballs; or EGGPLANT Balls. The BEEF, TURKEY, & EGGPLANT balls are all made with the classic recipe, but replacing the veal, beef, & pork blend with the aforementioned ingredients respectively. The EGGPLANT balls contain no meat, are very light and loaded with flavor and are a great choice for vegetarians however I do encourage everyone to try them! For your sauce choose from my “to die for” Joey’s Marinara, Spicy Marinara, Creamy Gorgonzola, or Pesto sauce. Enjoy your meatballs “Saucy” or on a Sub, with a salad, and of course with PASTA. You will see that at Brooklyn Meatball Company you can enjoy meatballs as a light nutritious lunch, snack, or as a mouth watering, comforting, complete delicious meal. Either way Brooklyn Meatball Company is the Ultimate Meatball Experience! All recipes at Brooklyn Meatball Company are based on the culinary wisdom and love that was instinctive to the beautiful great Grandmothers from the mountains of Italy and passed down to me through my beautiful Grandma Catherine!
